game.name: Superhero Pizza
game.description:
One of the best cooking game for girls to play, Superhero Pizza is, of course, an ultimate treat to teens, kids and groups who have immense love for pizza. Superheroes are very hungry. Since they have excellent skills to fly, so they will surely come to your shop to fulfill their cravings for the delicious dish â€“ Pizza. In this cool cooking game, your goal is to serve the perfectly prepared scrumptious pizza for the extremely hungry superheroes. The proper usage of the mouse will surely help you to make the job done successfully.  

This cool girls game will allow you to learn how to prepare the pizza using the superhero kitchen and serve your favorite heroes with the optimum possible quality of this scrumptious dish. Your best efforts will help to make your beloved superheroes feel proud. Superhero Pizza is a highly challenging and interesting time management simulation game in which your cooking skills can help you to serve the delicious timely and earn some good amount of tips from the superheroes in return.  

This cool flash game features colorful animation and personality and is enough to give you an incredibly polished gaming experience. The most challenging aspect of this popular cooking game is to remember which ingredients like chili-pepper, scallops, corn and BBQ sauce you have to use in what amount. With the introduction of time management genre for the young generation of online gamers, Superhero Pizza is filled with exciting challenge, humor and fun for the kids of all ages. Good luck to cook the best for the best!
